TopicTitle: What is Photo Mode going to look like? (if its a part of KSP2)

Articles.Content:
I have made many screenshots in KSP1 but photomode like we see in other games would be great.

Also I like the idea of seeing a Kerbal doing a thumbs up from within a capsule and different emotional expressions that are controllable.

(I am sure others have mentioned this on the overall forums, I just cant find it in the suggestions.
I really like the idea of kerbal positions and emotions for photos
